title: Consulting Services

title: William Yanes
text:
<iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-W6R723MF" height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe>

Transforming Data into Financial Strategy
I am a highly organized Finance Professional with over **10 years of experience** bridging the gap between traditional **Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A)** and modern **Data Science**.
My expertise lies in building robust financial models, ensuring internal controls (SOX/IFRS), and leveraging predictive modeling to drive strategic decision-making.






NoteOpen for Consulting



I am currently accepting new projects for financial modeling and data analysis.

3. La Brecha Digital: Conectividad vs.¬†Productividad
A pesar de que el acceso a internet supera el 70% en la mayor√≠a de departamentos, existe una brecha cr√≠tica en la tenencia de computadoras personales (laptops). Esta disparidad sugiere un alto consumo de contenido digital mediante smartphones, pero un reto pendiente en herramientas de productividad.
